root.swedish: S: vad kan jag hjälpa dig med U: jag vill köpa en hund S: kul. då skall jag ställa några frågor till dig och så ska vi se om vi kan hitta en hund som passar dina preferenser. i vilken grad ska din hund vara träningsbar U: ganska hög grad S: i vilken grad skall din hund fälla U: spelar ingen roll S: nä men om du tänker att U: ganska låg S: i vilken grad skall din hund ha energi U: ganska hög S: är det som ganska hög U: hög S: i vilken grad skall din hund skälla U: lite. låg S: och i vilken grad skall din hund vara beskyddande U: ganska låg S: ja då rekommenderar jag en volpino italiano
root.english: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: fun. then I will ask you a few questions and then we will see if we can find a dog that suits your preferences. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: quite a high degree A: to what degree should your dog shed U: doesn't matter A: no, but if you think U: quite low A: to what degree should your dog have energy U: quite high A: It's that pretty high U: high A: to what degree should your dog bark U: a little. low A: and to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low A: yes then I recommend a volpino italiano
root.distillation: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: fun. then I will ask you a few questions and then we will see if we can find a dog that suits your preferences. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: quite a high degree A: to what degree should your dog shed U: doesn't matter A: no, but if you think U: quite low A: to what degree should your dog have energy U: quite high A: It's that pretty high U: high A: to what degree should your dog bark U: a little. low A: and to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low A: yes then I recommend a volpino italiano
root.final: A: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog A: then I will ask you a few questions and then we will see if we can find a dog that suits your preferences. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: quite a high degree A: to what degree should your dog shed U: doesn't matter A: no, but perhaps you try to answer me the best you can U: quite low A: to what degree should your dog have energy U: quite high A: to what degree should your dog bark U: a little. low A: and to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low A: yes then I recommend a volpino italiano
